thread.title: Great location close to the tower
thread.title_full: Great location close to the tower - Review of Hotel Le Marquis, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: argiequeen
title: Great location close to the tower
text:
Great grocery store across the street, with a large selection of french wine, cheese trays and breads. Dry cleaning next door and half block from a laundry mat Breakfast at the hotel was overpriced for the variety and quality of it, but there is a small Patisserie at the corner to have an authentic french breakfast under 9 euros. Room is a nice size with a good bathroom, however the open shower concept is a competition to see who can get the bathroom floor more wet.
Room Tip: Rooms are newly renovated See more room tips
